entries.title: Signal Grid
entries.summary: Immersive wavefield performance system linking choreography and reactive light.
entries.content:
Signal Grid is a modular performance instrument that syncs a WebGL wavefield with motion-tracked choreography. The piece toured through late-night galleries and residencies, adapting its tempo to the crowd.

The system couples custom MIDI routing with depth sensors to adjust amplitude sweeps, colour palettes, and ripple harmonics in real time.

entries.title: Resonant Atlas
entries.summary: Browser-based instrument collaging field recordings with gestural synthesis.
entries.content:
Resonant Atlas invites visitors to blend captured ambisonic recordings with live synthesis. The UI tilts and warps the dotfield to reflect the current mix while exporting stems for further scoring.

The build includes patch diagrams, artist commentary, and tactile presets for installation use.

entries.title: Signal Bloom
entries.summary: Light sculpture driven by bio-signal data and ambient pulse loops.
entries.content:
Signal Bloom pairs bio-signal sensors with a luminous canopy. Visitors trigger ripples that travel through the canopy while harmonising audio loops in spatial audio.

Documentation includes build process photos, sensor schematics, and audio impressions captured on-site.
